H0.text: What large flightless bird found in Mauritius by the Portuguese is believed to have died out in 1681. Moa

H1.text: What large flightless bird found in Mauritius by the Portuguese is believed to have died out in 1681. Cassowary

H2.text: What large flightless bird found in Mauritius by the Portuguese is believed to have died out in 1681. Emu

H3.text: What large flightless bird found in Mauritius by the Portuguese is believed to have died out in 1681. Dodo

A4.text: The dodo (Raphus cucullatus) is an extinct flightless bird that was endemic to Mauritius.

A5.text: No records of dodos by these are known.
